name: Vicious (viciousgame)
description:
Vicious is a challenging platformer game where you collect fruits and avoid traps to reach the finish point.

You will play as Oingy, a creature from another dimension looking for a way back to their home. Oingy will travel to different dimensions, collecting fruits to survive for their journey. But there's no journey without danger, they will face many traps and complex terrains that can end them if they're not careful.

Traps

Six unique traps to aid Oingy to their death! Each traps has different functionality which Oingy needs to avoid. Find out what they'll do in the game!

Levels

There are three levels currently available, each of these levels has different themes designed to bring challenge to the players. Try to beat the levels with as few deaths as possible!

CONTROLS

A / Arrow Left = Move Left

D / Arrow Right = Move Right

Spacebar / Arrow Up = Jump

PLAY NOW!

You can play Oingy Boingy straight from the Oingy Boingy itch.io page or you can download the executable files from the link below (Only for PC Devices).

CREDITS
